00075 /*********************** add shape key ***********************/
00076 
00077 static void ED_object_shape_key_add(bContext *C, Scene *scene, Object *ob, int from_mix)
00078 {
00079     KeyBlock *kb;
00080     if ((kb = object_insert_shape_key(scene, ob, NULL, from_mix))) {
00081         Key *key= ob_get_key(ob);
00082         /* for absolute shape keys, new keys may not be added last */
00083         ob->shapenr = BLI_findindex(&key->block, kb) + 1;
00084 
00085         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
00086     }
00087 }
00088 
00089 /*********************** remove shape key ***********************/
00090 
00091 static int ED_object_shape_key_remove(bContext *C, Object *ob)
00092 {
00093     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00094     KeyBlock *kb, *rkb;
00095     Key *key;
00096     //IpoCurve *icu;
00097 
00098     key= ob_get_key(ob);
00099     if (key==NULL)
00100         return 0;
00101     
00102     kb= BLI_findlink(&key->block, ob->shapenr-1);
00103 
00104     if (kb) {
00105         for (rkb= key->block.first; rkb; rkb= rkb->next)
00106             if (rkb->relative == ob->shapenr-1)
00107                 rkb->relative= 0;
00108 
00109         BLI_remlink(&key->block, kb);
00110         key->totkey--;
00111         if (key->refkey== kb) {
00112             key->refkey= key->block.first;
00113 
00114             if (key->refkey) {
00115                 /* apply new basis key on original data */
00116                 switch(ob->type) {
00117                     case OB_MESH:
00118                         key_to_mesh(key->refkey, ob->data);
00119                         break;
00120                     case OB_CURVE:
00121                     case OB_SURF:
00122                         key_to_curve(key->refkey, ob->data, BKE_curve_nurbs(ob->data));
00123                         break;
00124                     case OB_LATTICE:
00125                         key_to_latt(key->refkey, ob->data);
00126                         break;
00127                 }
00128             }
00129         }
00130             
00131         if (kb->data) MEM_freeN(kb->data);
00132         MEM_freeN(kb);
00133 
00134         if (ob->shapenr > 1) {
00135             ob->shapenr--;
00136         }
00137     }
00138     
00139     if (key->totkey==0) {
00140         if (GS(key->from->name)==ID_ME) ((Mesh *)key->from)->key= NULL;
00141         else if (GS(key->from->name)==ID_CU) ((Curve *)key->from)->key= NULL;
00142         else if (GS(key->from->name)==ID_LT) ((Lattice *)key->from)->key= NULL;
00143 
00144         free_libblock_us(&(bmain->key), key);
00145     }
00146     
00147     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00148     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
00149 
00150     return 1;
00151 }
00152 
00153 static int object_shape_key_mirror(bContext *C, Object *ob)
00154 {
00155     KeyBlock *kb;
00156     Key *key;
00157 
00158     key= ob_get_key(ob);
00159     if (key==NULL)
00160         return 0;
00161     
00162     kb= BLI_findlink(&key->block, ob->shapenr-1);
00163 
00164     if (kb) {
00165         int i1, i2;
00166         float *fp1, *fp2;
00167         float tvec[3];
00168         char *tag_elem= MEM_callocN(sizeof(char) * kb->totelem, "shape_key_mirror");
00169 
00170 
00171         if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
00172             Mesh *me= ob->data;
00173             MVert *mv;
00174 
00175             mesh_octree_table(ob, NULL, NULL, 's');
00176 
00177             for (i1=0, mv=me->mvert; i1<me->totvert; i1++, mv++) {
00178                 i2= mesh_get_x_mirror_vert(ob, i1);
00179                 if (i2==i1) {
00180                     fp1= ((float *)kb->data) + i1*3;
00181                     fp1[0] = -fp1[0];
00182                     tag_elem[i1]= 1;
00183                 }
00184                 else if (i2 != -1) {
00185                     if (tag_elem[i1]==0 && tag_elem[i2]==0) {
00186                         fp1= ((float *)kb->data) + i1*3;
00187                         fp2= ((float *)kb->data) + i2*3;
00188 
00189                         copy_v3_v3(tvec,    fp1);
00190                         copy_v3_v3(fp1, fp2);
00191                         copy_v3_v3(fp2, tvec);
00192 
00193                         /* flip x axis */
00194                         fp1[0] = -fp1[0];
00195                         fp2[0] = -fp2[0];
00196                     }
00197                     tag_elem[i1]= tag_elem[i2]= 1;
00198                 }
00199             }
00200 
00201             mesh_octree_table(ob, NULL, NULL, 'e');
00202         }
00203         else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE) {
00204             Lattice *lt= ob->data;
00205             int i1, i2;
00206             float *fp1, *fp2;
00207             int u, v, w;
00208             /* half but found up odd value */
00209             const int pntsu_half = (lt->pntsu / 2) + (lt->pntsu % 2);
00210 
00211             /* currently editmode isn't supported by mesh so
00212              * ignore here for now too */
00213 
00214             /* if (lt->editlatt) lt= lt->editlatt->latt; */
00215 
00216             for (w=0; w<lt->pntsw; w++) {
00217                 for (v=0; v<lt->pntsv; v++) {
00218                     for (u=0; u<pntsu_half; u++) {
00219                         int u_inv= (lt->pntsu - 1) - u;
00220                         float tvec[3];
00221                         if (u == u_inv) {
00222                             i1= LT_INDEX(lt, u, v, w);
00223                             fp1= ((float *)kb->data) + i1*3;
00224                             fp1[0]= -fp1[0];
00225                         }
00226                         else {
00227                             i1= LT_INDEX(lt, u, v, w);
00228                             i2= LT_INDEX(lt, u_inv, v, w);
00229 
00230                             fp1= ((float *)kb->data) + i1*3;
00231                             fp2= ((float *)kb->data) + i2*3;
00232 
00233                             copy_v3_v3(tvec, fp1);
00234                             copy_v3_v3(fp1, fp2);
00235                             copy_v3_v3(fp2, tvec);
00236                             fp1[0]= -fp1[0];
00237                             fp2[0]= -fp2[0];
00238                         }
00239                     }
00240                 }
00241             }
00242         }
00243 
00244         MEM_freeN(tag_elem);
00245     }
00246     
00247     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00248     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
00249 
00250     return 1;
00251 }

00253 /********************** shape key operators *********************/
00254 
00255 static int shape_key_mode_poll(bContext *C)
00256 {
00257     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
00258     ID *data= (ob)? ob->data: NULL;
00259     return (ob && !ob->id.lib && data && !data->lib && ob->mode != OB_MODE_EDIT);
00260 }
00261 
00262 static int shape_key_poll(bContext *C)
00263 {
00264     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
00265     ID *data= (ob)? ob->data: NULL;
00266     return (ob && !ob->id.lib && data && !data->lib);
00267 }
00268 
00269 static int shape_key_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00270 {
00271     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00272     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
00273     int from_mix = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "from_mix");
00274 
00275     ED_object_shape_key_add(C, scene, ob, from_mix);
00276 
00277     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00278 }

00280 void OBJECT_OT_shape_key_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00281 {
00282     /* identifiers */
00283     ot->name = "Add Shape Key";
00284     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_shape_key_add";
00285     ot->description = "Add shape key to the object";
00286     
00287     /* api callbacks */
00288     ot->poll = shape_key_mode_poll;
00289     ot->exec = shape_key_add_exec;
00290 
00291     /* flags */
00292     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00293 
00294     /* properties */
00295     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "from_mix", 1, "From Mix", "Create the new shape key from the existing mix of keys");
00296 }

00298 static int shape_key_remove_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00299 {
00300     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
00301 
00302     if (!ED_object_shape_key_remove(C, ob))
00303         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00304     
00305     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00306 }

00323 static int shape_key_clear_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00324 {
00325     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
00326     Key *key= ob_get_key(ob);
00327     KeyBlock *kb= ob_get_keyblock(ob);
00328 
00329     if (!key || !kb)
00330         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00331     
00332     for (kb=key->block.first; kb; kb=kb->next)
00333         kb->curval= 0.0f;
00334 
00335     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00336     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
00337     
00338     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00339 }

00351

00354 }

00356 /* starting point and step size could be optional */
00357 static int shape_key_retime_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00358 {
00359     Object *ob = ED_object_context(C);
00360     Key *key = ob_get_key(ob);
00361     KeyBlock *kb = ob_get_keyblock(ob);
00362     float cfra = 0.0f;
00363 
00364     if (!key || !kb)
00365         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00366 
00367     for (kb=key->block.first; kb; kb=kb->next)
00368         kb->pos = (cfra += 0.1f);
00369 
00370     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00371     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
00372 
00373     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00374 }

00415 
00416 static int shape_key_move_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00417 {
00418     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
00419 
00420     int type= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00421     Key *key= ob_get_key(ob);
00422 
00423     if (key) {
00424         KeyBlock *kb, *kb_other;
00425         int shapenr_act= ob->shapenr-1;
00426         int shapenr_swap= shapenr_act + type;
00427         kb= BLI_findlink(&key->block, shapenr_act);
00428 
00429         if ((type==-1 && kb->prev==NULL) || (type==1 && kb->next==NULL)) {
00430             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00431         }
00432 
00433         for (kb_other= key->block.first; kb_other; kb_other= kb_other->next) {
00434             if (kb_other->relative == shapenr_act) {
00435                 kb_other->relative += type;
00436             }
00437             else if (kb_other->relative == shapenr_swap) {
00438                 kb_other->relative -= type;
00439             }
00440         }
00441 
00442         if (type==-1) {
00443             /* move back */
00444             kb_other= kb->prev;
00445             BLI_remlink(&key->block, kb);
00446             BLI_insertlinkbefore(&key->block, kb_other, kb);
00447             ob->shapenr--;
00448         }
00449         else {
00450             /* move next */
00451             kb_other= kb->next;
00452             BLI_remlink(&key->block, kb);
00453             BLI_insertlinkafter(&key->block, kb_other, kb);
00454             ob->shapenr++;
00455         }
00456 
00457         SWAP(float, kb_other->pos, kb->pos) /* for absolute shape keys */
00458     }
00459 
00460     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00461     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
00462 
00463     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00464 }

00466 void OBJECT_OT_shape_key_move(wmOperatorType *ot)
00467 {
00468     static EnumPropertyItem slot_move[] = {
00469         {-1, "UP", 0, "Up", ""},
00470         {1, "DOWN", 0, "Down", ""},
00471         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00472     };
00473 
00474     /* identifiers */
00475     ot->name = "Move Shape Key";
00476     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_shape_key_move";
00477 
00478     /* api callbacks */
00479     ot->poll = shape_key_mode_poll;
00480     ot->exec = shape_key_move_exec;
00481 
00482     /* flags */
00483     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00484 
00485     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", slot_move, 0, "Type", "");
00486 }
